business.headline: Stock market opening: Sensex, Nifty likely to continue their rally. Here's whyGift Nifty futures were trading at 24,484.5 as of 7:16 am, showing that the Nifty50 is likely to start the day higher than Monday's closing level of 24,328.5.

Stocks to watch today: Bajaj Finance, IndusInd Bank, Wipro, Adani Green, GensolSeveral companies, including Bajaj Finance, Bajaj Finserv, Bharat Petroleum Corporation, Ambuja Cements, etc are set to announce their fourth-quarter (Q4) results.

No bribes, no queues: Founder compares business setup in Dubai vs IndiaSharing his story on Reddit, the founder said he recently set up a business in one of Dubai's free zones and was amazed at how smooth the whole process was.

Want higher FD returns? RBL and Union Bank offer up to 8.5% to select customersAfter the latest revision, Union Bank of India now offers FD interest rates ranging from 3% to 7.15% for regular customers, depending on the deposit tenure (7 days to 10 years).

Zoho CEO Sridhar Vembu calls AI's impact on jobs 'small'Vembu pointed out that while AI vendors are promising big changes, real-world studies, including one titled 'Large Language Models, Small Labor Market Effects', show a different picture.

Sensex, Nifty surge over 1% as Reliance rally and FII buying lift marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex jumped over 1,000 points to close at 80,218.37, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 289.15 points to end at 24,328.50.

Trump's tariffs are raising recession fears. How bad could it get?Just three months ago, economists covering nearly 50 economies had forecast a steady, healthy pace of global growth. But Trump's decision to slap sweeping tariffs, including a 10% blanket duty on all US imports and a 145% tariff on goods from China, has upset those expectations.

Gold prices continue falling: What is driving the prices low?Gold is often seen as a safe place to store value during times of political and financial uncertainty. It touched an all-time high of $3,500.05 per ounce last week because of trade tensions.

New Income tax regime: Why is it more beneficial for salaried employeesThe new tax regime also offers a higher standard deduction. Last year, it was raised from Rs 50,000 to Rs 75,000 for salaried employees. In the old regime, the standard deduction remains at Rs 50,000.

Defence stocks rally up to 10% as Indo-Pak tensions rise. Should you buy?The Nifty Defence index rose by 4.5%, marking its biggest intraday gain since April 15, 2025. Out of the eighteen companies that form the index, seventeen were trading higher.

EPFO simplifies PF transfer process. Check how it impacts employeesThe new revision is expected to benefit over 1.25 crore members and will speed up the transfer of Rs 90,000 crore of PF funds annually, ensuring that employees can access and manage their retirement savings without any trouble after changing jobs.
Rupee ticks up, volatility expectations climb to two-year peakThe rupee was at 85.26 against the US dollar as of 11:00 am, up from its close at 85.45 in the previous session.

ITR Filing 2025: What's new in your Form 16? Here's all you need to knowForm 16 is a certificate that an employer gives to an employee, which shows how much salary he earned and how much tax they deducted from it on the employee's behalf. It's proof that your taxes have been properly paid to the government.

Explained: How Pakistan could lose millions after closing airspace for IndiaPakistan's decision to close its airspace to Indian airlines, after India's diplomatic move against Pakistan over the Pahalgam terror attack, is likely to cause disruptions on several key international routes, particularly flights departing from North India.

Ather Energy IPO: Should you subscribe or not?Ather Energy IPO: The IPO is a book-built offer worth Rs 2,980.76 crore, comprising a fresh issue of 8.18 crore equity shares valued at Rs 2,626.30 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.11 crore shares aggregating Rs 354.76 crore.

Sensex jumps over 1,000 points. 3 reasons behind today's stock market rallyStock market today: At around 12:20 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was trading 1008.25 points higher at 80,220.78, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 239.90 points to 24,279.05., while the NSE Nifty50 rose 237.10 points to 24,276.45. All broader market indices were also firmly in positive territory, signalling the potential for a strong session ahead.

Reliane shares jump over 4% after strong Q4 results. Buy, hold or sell?The Mukesh Ambani-led conglomerate reported a 2% rise in consolidated net profit to Rs 19,407 crore, beating analysts' expectations of around Rs 18,471 crore. Revenue from operations for the quarter grew 10% year-on-year to Rs 2.64 lakh crore.
Sensex, Nifty rally driven by Reliance boost and positive Asian market trendsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 558.35 points to 79,770.88, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 155.75 points to 24,195.10as of 9:47 am.

Ather Energy IPO opens for bidding: Should you subscribe? Check latest GMPAther Energy IPO is a book-built issue worth Rs 2,980.76 crore. It includes a fresh issue of 8.18 crore shares aggregating to Rs 2,626.30 crore, and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.11 crore shares worth Rs 354.76 crore.

Sensex, Nifty opening: Will stock market rise or fall today?The situation between India and Pakistan remains tense after the recent attack in Kashmir. This tension pulled down both the Sensex and Nifty on Friday.

Stocks to watch on April 28: RIL, IDFC First Bank, Mahindra, Axis BankVarious stocks are likely to see big movements today, April 28, as several companies are set to announce their quarterly earnings and other key updates.

India lifted 171 million people from extreme poverty from 2012 to 2022: World BankRural extreme poverty dropped from 18.4 per cent to 2.8 per cent, and urban from 10.7 per cent to 1.1 per cent, narrowing the rural-urban gap from 7.7 to 1.7 percentage points.

Changing jobs? Check this EPFO update on PF transfersEffective January 2025, the requirement for employer approval in most transfer cases has been eliminated. Previously, PF balance transfers required coordination between source and destination EPFO offices, often causing delays.

E-commerce, crops, data storage top India-US trade deal negotiations: ReportDiscussions will now begin on issues such as market access for US farm goods, India's data localisation rules, and the role of big tech in e-commerce—areas that have previously proved politically sensitive in India.

Indian airlines may face turbulence as Pakistan closes its skiesPakistan has announced shutting its airspace to Indian carriers as tensions rise between the two neighbours following a deadly militant attack in Indian Kashmir earlier this week.

Samsung to invest Rs 1,000 crore in Tamil Nadu plant: ReportSamsung's Tamil Nadu factory currently employs over 2,000 people. In 2022–23, the plant contributed one-fifth of Samsung's Rs 1 lakh crore sales in India.
Sensex, Nifty close lower as rising India-Pakistan tension spooks investorsThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 588.80 points to end at 79,212.53, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 207.35 points to end at 24,039.35.

Pahalgam terror attack casts big shadow on Kashmir's booming tourism economyKashmir was slowly rebuilding its image as a peaceful tourist destination after years of conflict, especially after the abrogation of Article 370 in August 2019.

Sebi revises cut-off timings for overnight mutual fund redemptions. Details hereSebi aims to make sure stock brokers and clearing members use client funds wisely by investing in secure overnight mutual fund schemes (MFOS).

Air India may buy 10 Boeing planes turned down by China: ReportThe ongoing trade tensions between the US and China, marked by steep duties above 100%, have impacted various sectors, even the aviation industry has taken a hit.
Pakistan Stock Exchange portal crashes amid rising geopolitical heatThe online portal of PSX showed a message saying "We'll be back soon," indicating that the website was temporarily unavailable.

Bengaluru resident shares costly homebuying mistake: 'Don't fall for FOMO'A social media user from Bengaluru shared that he has been living in Bengaluru for the past six years. Like many others, he moved to the city for better career opportunities. Despite being financially stable, he chose to rent rather than buy a flat. But the trouble started soon after.

Sensex, Nifty tank: Indo-Pak tensions trigger market crash. Check top losersSensex plunged over 1,000 points, while Nifty tanked over 300 points, falling below 24,000 as uncertainty prevailed over geopolitical tensions.

Apple plans to make all US iPhones in India by 2026: ReportThe said move is part of Apple's long-term plan to reduce its dependence on China, especially after the recent tariff rules announced by US President Donald Trump.

Ather Energy IPO: Check latest GMP as Rs 3,000 crore public listing to open soonThe Ather Energy IPO will be a book-built issue. It consists of a fresh issue of 8.18 crore equity shares worth Rs 2,626 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) of 1.11 crore shares worth Rs 354.76 crore.

Sensex falls 1,000 points: Why is stock market falling today despite early gains?Sensex and Nifty plunged more than 1% reacting to uncertainty over geopolitical tensions. The S&P BSE Sensex tanked 1,026.28 points to 78,775.15, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 330.40 points to 23,916.30 as of 11:41 am.
Sensex, Nifty erase early gains as markets react to Kashmir terror attackThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 492.29 points to 79,309.14, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 172.15 points to 24,074.55 as of 10 am.

Sensex, Nifty today: Will Dalal Street return to winning ways on April 25?Stock market today: Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,522 as of 7:48 am, which is about 1.1% above Thursday's Nifty50 close of 24,246.7.

Stocks to watch today: RIL, Axis Bank, Gensol, IndusInd Bank, Maruti SuzukiReliance Industries will announce its results for the March 2025 quarter today. The market will be watching closely for updates on its energy, telecom, and retail businesses.

ED raids Gensol promoters, detains Puneet Jaggi from Delhi hotel: ReportSources said the probe agency has invoked provisions under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) following findings of fund diversion and misrepresentation flagged earlier by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi).

entertainment.headline: Ajith Kumar calls for peace after Pahalgam attack: Let's not fight among ourselvesActor Ajith Kumar reacted to Pahalgam attack after receiving Padma Bhushan award in New Delhi. He called for peace and said that everyone should learn to respect each other, every religion and caste and end the fights within ourselves.

Binge-worthy alert: 7 must-see Netflix seriesNetflix's latest lineup offers thrilling dramas, heartfelt journeys, culinary masterpieces, and dark twists. From Love on the Spectrum to You's final season, there's something exciting for every viewer.

Autopsy reveals heart disease and Alzheimer's led to Gene Hackman's deathGene Hackman died from heart disease and advanced Alzheimer's, an autopsy confirms. His wife, Betsy Arakawa, likely died days earlier from hantavirus. Investigations continue into the couple's tragic deaths.

Watch: Actor Shraddha Arya returns to Kumkum Bhagya set after maternity breakActor Shraddha Arya has returned to work after a maternity break. The actor will reprise her role as Preeta on the show. She welcomed twins, a baby boy and a baby girl, on November 29, 2024, with her husband Rahul Nagal.

Aamir Khan clarifies after his AI-generated poster as Guru Nanak goes viralAamir Khan's team recently clarified the AI-generated poster that falsely depicted the actor as Guru Nanak Dev. A fake YouTube channel circulated the content, sparking outrage.

Ajith Kumar, Shekhar Kapur honoured with Padma BhushanAjith Kumar, Nandamuri Balakrishna and Shekhar Kapur bagged Padma Awards in New Delhi on April 28. The actors received the prestigious award from President Droupadi Murmu.

Veteran Malayalam director Shaji Karun dies of cancer at 73Renowned filmmaker Shaji N Karun, who made significant contributions to Malayalam cinema and earned accolades like the Padma Shri, has died at 73 after a prolonged battle with cancer.

You Season 5 review: A disappointing, predictable goodbye to Joe GoldbergReleased-Thu Apr 24, 2025The psychological thriller 'You', starring Penn Badgley as the show-runner, premiered its season finale on April 24. The show concludes its journey with Joe Goldberg facing the consequences of his dark past while navigating personal turmoil. As the final season unfolds, familiar faces and new challenges emerge, questioning whether redemption or downfall awaits him.

Baahubali returns to theatres in 2025, confirms producer on 8th anniversary'Baahubali' is all set to re-release in theatres this October. On the film's eighth anniversary, producer Shobu Yarlagadda announced that the film will be back in theatres with new surprises.

Suriya's comeback quest: Will Karthik Subbaraj's Retro end the dry spell?Suriya is one of the most celebrated actors in the Tamil film industry. However, he hasn't had a big hit in the last decade. Will his upcoming film, 'Retro', help end his decade-long drought at the box office?

Suits LA Season Episode 10 review: 10 episodes and yet something feels unfinished Released-Mon Apr 28, 2025'Suits LA' Season 1 premiered its 10th episode on Monday (IST), and while it featured all the elements from the 'Suits' series, including the charismatic Harvey Spector, it never fully delivered.
Moments in Phule were pure gold: Rajkummar Rao praises Patralekhaa's performanceRajkummar Rao praised his wife Patralekhaa's performance in 'Phule'. The film released in theatres on April 25.
Actor Seema Pahwa hints at quitting films: The condition is very badActor Seema Pahwa hinted at quitting films. She mentioned how creative people have been murdered.

Gram Chikitsalay release date out: Amol Parashar leads series on rural healthcarePrime Video's new series 'Gram Chikitsalay', starring Amol Parashar, is set to premiere on May 9, 2025. The series, created by Deepak Kumar Mishra, promises a blend of humour and social commentary.

Who is Neha Singh Rathore, Bhojpuri singer facing sedition for Kashmir attack postsPopular singer Neha Singh Rathore is facing a sedition case over her statements about the Pahalgam terror attack. The complainant claimed that she made provocative posts targeting a religious community.

Subham trailer: Samantha's first production is a horror-comedy with a comic twistThe trailer of 'Subham', Samantha's debut production, is out. The horror-comedy features the actor in a hilarious cameo and will release on May 9.

Actor Makarand Deshpande leads peaceful protest against Pahalgam attackVeteran actor Makarand Deshpande led peaceful protest in Mumbai against the Pahalgam terror attack in a bid to extend his support to the government.

Hania Aamir gives shoutout to Badshah amid growing India-Pakistan tensionsPakistani actor Hania Aamir cheered for her close friend and rapper Badshah for his upcoming track. It was also rumoured that the two were dating each other.

Paresh Rawal accuses National Award of 'corruption, lobbying': It's all a gameActor Paresh Rawal opened up about the National Awards and shared that it is driven by 'aggressive lobbying'. The veteran actor added that he was made aware of lobbying and corruption when his film 'Sir' (1993) won the National Award.

general news.headline: Mark Carney's Liberals projected to win Canada electionsMark Carney is set to stay on as Canada's Prime Minister after Canadian broadcasters called the federal election for his Liberal Party, dashing the hopes of the Conservatives led by Pierre Poilievre.

Your Minister admitted to...: India shreds 'rogue state' Pakistan at UNCalling India a "victim of cross-border terrorism," the Deputy Ambassador pointed to Pakistan Defence Minister Khwaja Asif's "open confession" regarding Pakistan's history of supporting terrorist groups.

Vaibhav Suryavanshi, 14, smashes 35-ball hundred, breaks world recordIPL 2025, RR vs GT: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi became the youngest man in the history of Twenty20 cricket to hit a hundred. The Bihar batter hit the second-fastest century in IPL history.

Zipline operator who said 'Allahu Akbar' in tourist video summoned by NIA: SourcesAfter a video, showing a zipline operator shouting 'Allahu Akbar' in Pahalgam, surfaced online, he has been called in for questioning by the NIA and Jammu and Kashmir Police, as per sources.

Terrorism in Kashmir: Nine years of calm before icy stormIn part 2 of our series on the history of terrorism in Kashmir, we revisit the calm before the storm that prevailed from 1980 to the summer of 1989.

Indian student in Canada, missing for three days, found deadA missing Indian student in Canada, Vanshika, was found dead and local authorities are investigating the cause of death, the Indian Embassy in Canada said.

Vaibhav Suryavanshi turns Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii dream into IPL realityIn a scene straight out of Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii, Vaibhav Suryavanshi turned childhood dreams into reality. With every fearless shot, he proved the magic wasn't in a lucky bat — it was in his own heart all along.

Hamas's Oct 7 strike inspired terrorists globally: Israeli envoy on J&K attackSpeaking to India Today TV, Israeli envoy Reuven Azar warned that the October 7 Hamas attack has triggered a global wave of terror inspiration, linking it to the Pahalgam massacre that killed 26 civilians in Kashmir.

From Isha Ambani to Alia Bhatt: Iconic Met Gala fashion moments ft. Indian celebsAhead of the Met Gala 2025, let's revisit some of the most iconic Indian fashion moments from previous editions of the charity gala.

Stock market opening: Sensex, Nifty likely to continue their rally. Here's whyGift Nifty futures were trading at 24,484.5 as of 7:16 am, showing that the Nifty50 is likely to start the day higher than Monday's closing level of 24,328.5.

Military action by India is imminent after Pahalgam attack: Pak Defence MinisterKhawaja Muhammad Asif said that the Pakistani military has briefed the government about the possibility of an attack by India in view of the deadly Pahalgam terror assault.

Watch: Rahul Dravid gets off wheelchair to celebrate Vaibhav Suryavanshi's 101IPL 2025, RR vs GT: Rahul Dravid got off from his wheelchair to praise Vaibhav Suryavanshi, who scored a 35-ball hundred against Gujarat Titans at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.

Startling video shows tourist ziplining in Pahalgam as carnage unfolds belowA chilling video has emerged from Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, showing a tourist calmly ziplining across the picturesque landscape, unaware of the deadly terror attack unfolding below. In the footage, the man, identified as Rishi Bhatt, can be seen recording himself with a smile while gunshots ring out in the background. Meanwhile, terrorists were mercilessly firing on other tourists in the Baisaran meadow that left 26 people dead on April 22.

Later, speaking to India Today TV, Bhatt said that it was towards the end of his ziplining he realised that something was amiss.  "It was towards the end of my ziplining that I sensed something was wrong. I stopped the zipline, jumped from 15 feet, and began running with my wife and son," he said. Bhatt also revealed that firing started soon after the zipline operator had chanted "Allah hu Akbar".

Enough is enough: Indian-American Democrat moves to impeach Donald TrumpIndian-American Rep. Shri Thanedar filed articles of impeachment against Trump, accusing him of abusing power, violating the Constitution, and endangering democracy. Thanedar called for urgent action.

Pak Army continues cross-border firing for 5th day, Indian troops retaliateThe Pakistan Army resorted to unprovoked small arms firing across multiple locations along the Line of Control, prompting a measured Indian Army response, amid escalating tensions following the Pahalgam terror attacks.

'I run the country and the world,' declares Donald TrumpPresident Trump asserts dominance in The Atlantic interview, claiming global leadership. Despite this, his approval ratings hit historic lows amid aggressive immigration policies and economic concerns.​

Amazon launches first Operational Kuiper satellites to compete with SpaceX's StarlinkAmazon launched 27 satellites as part of its Project Kuiper, aiming to provide global broadband services. The company competes with SpaceX's Starlink, and plans to deploy over 3,200 satellites.

RG Kar victim's number used for few months after her death: Family's big claimThe family of the RG Kar trainee doctor, who was raped and murdered in the Kolkata-based hospital last year, alleged that the victim's number was removed from a WhatsApp group and used for a few months after her death.

Zipline operator said Allahu Akbar thrice, then firing started: Tourist to India TodayIn the video, the man, identified as Rishi Bhatt, is seen smiling and recording himself as gunshots are heard in the background in Pahalgam.

4 dead, including children, after car crashes into Illinois after-school centerFour people were killed and six others injured after a car crashed through the YNOT Outdoors after-school center in Chatham, Illinois. The driver was hospitalised for evaluation.

Pahalgam attack spotlights Pakistan's terror strategy in post-Article 370 KashmirIslamabad has redirected its proxy war to the less militarised region south of the Pir Panjal range while raising shadow outfits that project terrorism in J&K as homegrown

Power restored in parts of Spain and Portugal after hours-long outagePower began to be restored in parts of Spain and Portugal after a massive outage in both countries led to the grounding of flights, halting public transport and forcing hospitals to suspend routine operations.

Influencer mother's erratic lifestyle no reason to deny custody of child: CourtThe Bombay High Court refused a father's plea seeking custody of his three-year-old daughter on the grounds that the mother earns enough and her life as a social media influencer is not a hindrance to their daughter's welfare.

Notices to 3 Pakistanis living in Kerala asking them to leave India withdrawnAmid heightened tensions between India and Pakistan following the Pahalgam terror attack, police have withdrawn notices issued to three Pakistani nationals living in Kerala's Kozhikode after they were found to have long-term visas.

sports.headline: What makes Vaibhav Suryavanshi special? RR batting coach decodes IPL sensationRR's batting coach Vikram Rathour heaped praise on Vaibhav Suryavanshi and explained what makes the IPL sensation so special after his hundred against GT on April 28.

Vaibhav Suryavanshi turns Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii dream into IPL realityIn a scene straight out of Chain Kulii Ki Main Kulii, Vaibhav Suryavanshi turned childhood dreams into reality. With every fearless shot, he proved the magic wasn't in a lucky bat — it was in his own heart all along.

Class: Rohit Sharma in awe of Suryavanshi's heroic 101 vs GTIPL 2025, RR vs GT: Rohit Sharma was impressed with Vaibhav Suryavanshi's 101-run knock for the Rajasthan Royals (RR) against Gujarat Titans (GT) on Monday at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.

Vaibhav Suryavanshi on his groundbreaking 101: No fear, just focused on the ballIPL 2025, RR vs GT: Vaibhav Suryavanshi said he felt no pressure in the middle and just focused on the ball as he smashed the fastest hundred by an Indian in the Indian Premier League. The 14-year-old's 38-ball 101 helped Rajasthan chase down 210 and end their five-match losing streak in this season.

IPL 2025: Vaibhav Suryavanshi's record-breaking 35-ball 101 in statsIPL 2025, RR vs GT: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi broke several records as the Rajasthan Royals beat the Gujarat Titans by eight wickets on April 28 at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.

What were you doing at 14? Vaibhav Suryavanshi's 101 thrills cricket worldAt just 14, Vaibhav Suryavanshi lit up the IPL stage, becoming the youngest player to smash a T20 hundred and setting off a global wave of admiration with his fearless and unforgettable innings for Rajasthan Royals.

Wunderkind Vaibhav Suryavanshi's record 101 helps Rajasthan snap losing streakIPL 2025: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi shone in Rajasthan Royals' successful chase of 210 against Gujarat Titans. The teenager smashed 101 from just 38 deliveries in Jaipur to help end the home side's five-match losing streak.

Watch: Rahul Dravid gets off wheelchair to celebrate Vaibhav Suryavanshi's 101IPL 2025, RR vs GT: Rahul Dravid got off from his wheelchair to praise Vaibhav Suryavanshi, who scored a 35-ball hundred against Gujarat Titans at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.

14-year-old Vaibhav breaks world record, youngest to hit T20 fiftyIPL 2025, RR vs GT: Vaibhav Suryavanshi smashed a 17-ball fifty and became the youngest to hit a fifty in T20 cricket, breaking Hassan Eisakhil's record.

14-year-old Vaibhav breaks world record, youngest to hit T20 fiftyIPL 2025, RR vs GT: Vaibhav Suryavanshi smashed a 17-ball fifty and became the youngest to hit a fifty in T20 cricket, breaking Hassan Eisakhil's record.

Shikhar Dhawan slams Shahid Afridi for blaming Indian Army for Pahalgam attackFormer India opener Shikhar Dhawan, in a strongly-worded social media post, slammed Shahid Afridi after the ex-Paksitan cricketer blamed the Indian Army for the terror attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir.

Good that he got out: KL Rahul, Virat Kohli joke about 'my ground' celebrationIPL 2025: After DC's clash against RCB, KL Rahul revealed he was secretly relieved that Virat Kohli got out before finishing the match, avoiding another cheeky "my ground" celebration moment right in front of him.
Play suspended at Madrid Open over large-scale power outageMatches in the Madrid Open 2025 came to a halt after a widespread power outage in the Spanish capital on Monday, April 28.

Harshit Rana missing thrill and aura of Gautam Gambhir at KKRFast bowler Harshit Rana is missing the thrill and aura of Gautam Gambhir in the Kolkata Knight Riders camp this season. With Chandrakanth Pandit at the helm, KKR have simply not gelled well this season.

Virat Kohli can't have Andre Russell's strike rate, has his own style: Ajay JadejaIPL 2025: Former India batter Ajay Jadeja said the problem lies with the critics, not with Virat Kohli, when it comes to discussions about his strike rate. Kohli is the leading run-getter in the IPL season, but his strike rate is the lowest among top 10 batters.

Gujarat Titans hand debut to Karim Janat, 10th Afghan player in IPLIPL 2025, RR vs GT: Karim Janat made his IPL debut after Gujarat Titans handed him his maiden cap before the match against Rajasthan Royals at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur.

PR Sreejesh, R Ashwin receive Padma awards from President Droupadi MurmuFormer Indian off-spinner R Ashwin and Indian hockey legend PR Sreejesh got the prestigious Padma Awards from President Droupadi Murmu on Monday, April 28 at the Rashtrapati Bhavan in New Delhi.

Australian podcaster removes all IPL content after legal notice from BCCIAfter receiving a polite legal notice from BCCI, popular Australian podcast The Grade Cricketer removed all IPL-related videos from their social media, which they even clarified through a statement.

India vs South Africa, Women's Tri-series: When and where to watch?Harmanpreet Kaur's India and Laura Wolvaardt's South Africa will face each other in the second match of the tri-series on Tuesday, April 29 at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.

Kaneria slams Shahid Afridi, calls him out for extremist viewsFormer Pakistan cricketer Danish Kaneria has hit out against Shahid Afridi after a video of the latter went viral on the internet. In the video, Shahid alleged that India killed its own people in the Pahalgam terror attack.

Pratika Rawal eyes Women's ODI history, nears Shubman Gill's India recordIndia's Pratika Rawal is on the cusp of becoming the fastest batter to the landmark of 500 runs in Women's ODIs, going past former England batter Charlotte Edwards.

Virat Kohli was a spirited teen: Preity Zinta recalls IPL chat with RCB starIPL 2025: While responding to questions from fans on social media, Bollywood star Preity Zinta recalled a chat with Virat Kohli after Punjab Kings' home game in Mullanpur against Royal Challengers Bengaluru.

IPL to add 20 more matches from 2028, adopt full home-away format: Arun DhumalThe Indian cricket board (BCCI) is planning to expand the Indian Premier League to a 94-match season by 2028, revealed IPL chairman Arun Dhumal. Currently, the IPL has 74 matches spread over a period of 60-65 days.

Mumbai Indians are on a roll, every team should be scared of them: Piyush ChawlaFormer India cricketer turned commentator Piyush Chawla has fired a warning to all the teams of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) mentioning Mumbai Indians' sudden rise to form.

Watch: Virat Kohli touches childhood coach's feet after match-winning 50 vs DCStar India batter Virat Kohli had a heartwarming meet-up with his childhood coach Rajkumar Sharma after his match-winning half-century against Delhi Capitals (DC).

Not Virat Kohli, Manjrekar praises bowlers as the real heroes for RCBRoyal Challengers Bengaluru continued their winning run away from home. In a complete performance, they beat Delhi Capitals at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi. After the game, Sanjay Manjrekar praised the team's bowling unit.

Kevin Pietersen flips out at question over T Natarajan: Tell me where he fits?Delhi Capitals (DC) mentor Kevin Pietersen flipped out at a journalist for a question about T. Natarajan's absence from Delhi's playing XI in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Slot honours Jurgen Klopp after Liverpool win Premier LeagueLiverpool beat Tottenham 5-1 to secure the Premier League title on Sunday, April 27. After the win, Liverpool manager Arne Slot paid tribute to Jurgen Klopp, who was the manager of the club before him.

Bumrah's wife Sanjana slams trolls: Angad is not a topic for your entertainmentIndia fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah's wife Sanjana Ganesan has lashed out at trolls over insensitive remarks for their son Angad. Sanjana was in attendance with her son for Mumbai Indians' game against Lucknow Super Giants.
Shoaib Akhtar's YouTube channel gets blocked in IndiaFormer Pakistan cricketer Shoaib Akhtar's YouTube channel was blocked by the Indian government in the aftermath of the Pahalgam terror attack.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
